Header: President signs documents to extradite Arjun Mahendran
Content: President Maithripala Sirisena today signed the relevant documents to extradite former Central Bank governor Arjun Mahendran from Singapore over the bond scam case. The President inked the documents that should be directed to the Government of Singapore for the extradition of former Central Bank Governor Arjun Mahendran with respect to the Central Bank Bond scam case. The Attorney General had recently submitted a 22,000-page document to the Foreign Affairs and Defence Ministries in a bid to extradite the suspect and these should be directed to the Singaporean Government. President Maithripala Sirisena examined these documents and as Defence Minister he certified these documents. Arrangements have been made to direct these documents as quickly as possible to authorities of the Singaporean Government through the Foreign Ministry.
